attributes.action: make military IDs a nationally recognised form of ID
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make military IDs a nationally recognised form of ID. That way all establishments would have to accept them along with passports or driving licences. At the same time they can make it a crime to discriminate against military personel regardless of whether they are in uniform or not.

government_responses.details:
